description: Amazing app! Sorted out my Desktop in one click!

Fast, beautiful and user-friendly! 

I wish there were more apps like this for Linux!
This app is extremely fast and super easy to use. So happy with the results!
By far the best file organizer available out there! Love it!

This is a amazing file handling software. The design of the app is excellent: it is simple with powerful functionality under the hood. 

Highly recommended!
Its really good but was over priced. As a dev I am willing to pay to help another dev out, but I just really felt like your pushing up the price way to high, for a program that organizes files.
summary: Its a good program, but your loaing customers ;

description: Demo only let you organize the desktop, for which any sane person doesn't have any file. It as 20$ dollars for full functionality. That's way to high for an app I can't even test (at least let me use it in the download folder). I would pay max 2 dollars for an app that organize files.
summary: Demo is a waste of time and premium is overpriced

description:
Works well and when I had a small issues dev helped me out right away!
Worth it.

I don't think anything of it - there is not even a screenshot! I have no idea exactly what it does. I didn't want to rate this, since I really know NOTHING about it, but it wouldn't let me post if I didn't click SOMETHING in the stars line, so I picked the middle. I AM looking for something in Linux that will remember each folder's position, view, size, (or even only the folders you ask it to remember). I am also looking for a way to put my own icons on things (apps, files, folders) and an icon editor. If all the icons look identical, especially on the bar when there is not even any text to differentiate them from one another, icons are pretty useless in Linux. XP was the best OS (file manager-wise, as well as user control of everything!) I've ever used. I could easily disable peer-to-peer and remote access. So far, nothing in Linux is easy. I would like to know where things are, and how they are named - you can't match the file/folder names to directories, so you can't EASILY tell where anything is in the directories.
summary: Need illustrations of this software. Other things I wish Linux had

description: Not Good... Nothing to do... Shareware...
summary: Not Good... Nothing to do... Shareware..

description: kann nix, macht nix, zeigt nix; fordert nur auf, das Programm zu kaufen ...
Otro programa que te manda a una página web para la versión completa y tienes que pagar. ¿Porque no dicen que la aplicación es de pago? Tiempo perdido instalando.
